data.eml:eml: Robber flies of South Korea III. South Korean species of the Subfamily Laphriinae Macquart, 1838 (Diptera: Asilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Young, Charles L., Hradský, Milan M. (2007): Robber flies of South Korea III. South Korean species of the Subfamily Laphriinae Macquart, 1838 (Diptera: Asilidae). Zootaxa 1388: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175153
